column1: Uchi////Why 4 stars and not 5?  Well...  Though we have had a reservation for weeks
column2: they asked us to wait (last Friday) for our entire party of 9 to appear
column3: though 8 of us were there.  Not a travesty by any means but...  It meant that our night started off on the wrong foot.  (BTW our table was ready and waiting for us the whole time - 25 min...)
